description.value: Cerunnos regains 15 hit points whenever he starts his turn and has at least 1 hit point. If Cerunnos takes necrotic damage, his regeneration does not function on his next turn.
Cerunnos makes saving throws at the start and the end of his turn.

Basic Attack

At-Will âœ¦ lightning, teleportation, weapon

Standard

Attack: Melee 2 or ranged 10 (one creature)

+30 vs. AC

Hit: 3d8 + 19 damage (or 33 plus 6d6 lightning damage if Cerunnos scores a critical hit), and Cerunnos teleports the target up to 10 squares.

Effect: Cerunnos shifts up to half his speed. If the attack was ranged, the spear returns to his hand.

At-Will

Standard

Effect: Cerunnos makes two spear attacks.

Encounter

Standard

Effect: Close burst 1 mile (allies in the burst that can hear); as a free action, the target can move up to its speed and make a basic attack.

At-Will 1/round

Minor

Attack: Ranged 10 (one creature)

+28 vs. Will

Hit: Until the end of Cerunnos's next turn, the target is marked, grants combat advantage, and cannot benefit from invisibility or concealment.

At-Will

Triggered

Trigger: An enemy is bloodied by Cerunnos's attack.

Effect (Free Action): Cerunnos can make a spear attack against the triggering enemy.

Recharge when first bloodied

Triggered

Trigger: Cerunnos hits with a spear attack.

Effect (Free Action): The hit becomes a critical hit. If the target drops below 1 hit point due to the hit, Cerunnos gains 1 action point.

At-Will âœ¦ fear, psychic

Triggered

Trigger: An enemy attacks Cerunnos during his turn.

Attack (No Action): Melee 1 (the triggering enemy)

+28 vs. Will

Hit: 20 psychic damage, and the target falls prone.

HP 400; Bloodied 200
Immune charm, sleep 		Init +23 | AP 1 | Save +2 (+4 against immobilized, restrained, and slowed)
AC 39Fort 37Ref 38Will 37
Speed 8 (forest walk), fly 8
Ability ScoresStr 25 (+19)
Con 25 (+19)		Dex 28 (+21)
Int 20 (+17)		Wis 24 (+19)
Cha 26 (+20)
Languages Common, Elven
Alignment Unaligned
Skills Acrobatics +26, Athletics +24, Nature +24, Stealth +26Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 29 | Insight 29
